name: zygodactyl
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a bird's foot) having two toes pointing forwards and two toes pointing backwards: the cuckoo's zygodactyl toes

a bird's foot that has two toes pointing forwards and two toes pointing backwards, or the bird itself: Woodpeckers have zygodactyls.
